channel.title: Comments on: Refused, The Shape Of Punk To Come (Epitaph / Burning Heart)

item.title: By: fak3r
item.dc:creator: fak3r
item.description: ha, this post is almost 10 years old, and it still stands up! Dennis' vocals are like no other, and I'm discovering that again listening to what he's doing in AC4. Still, the 'cooing' and 'half-yelling' you describe above is spot on! He is an amazing vocalist.
item.content:encoded: ha, this post is almost 10 years old, and it still stands up! Dennis’ vocals are like no other, and I’m discovering that again listening to what he’s doing in AC4. Still, the ‘cooing’ and ‘half-yelling’ you describe above is spot on! He is an amazing vocalist.
